Entities.Name: Drug screening
Entities.Definition: Drug screening results by type and result (e.g., opioid/non-opioid, positive/negative).
Entities.SampleData: Toxicology screen [positive for benzos and opiates].

Entities.Name: Interpersonal and legal consequences
Entities.Definition: Consequences of opioid use related to relationships or legal issues.
Entities.SampleData: Was [arrested last Tuesday for possession of drug].
Entities.Annotation: [arrested last Tuesday for possession of drug]

Entities.Name: Opioid abuse uncertain
Entities.Definition: Possible but unclear indication of opioid misuse.
Entities.SampleData: Question of [possible heroin use prior to the accident].
Entities.Annotation: [possible heroin use prior to the accident]

Entities.Name: Opioid dependency indicator
Entities.Definition: Signs of opioid dependency such as withdrawal, craving, or tolerance.

Entities.Name: Opioid illicit use
Entities.Definition: Recent or ongoing illicit opioid use.

Entities.Name: Opioid past illicit use
Entities.Definition: Historical illicit opioid use.

Entities.Name: Opioid reduction successful
Entities.Definition: Successful attempt to reduce or control opioid use.
Entities.SampleData: Weaned himself down to [3–4 mg PO].

Entities.Name: Opioid reduction unsuccessful
Entities.Definition: Unsuccessful effort to reduce opioid use.

Entities.Name: Opioid seeking
Entities.Definition: Behavior indicative of opioid-seeking (e.g., lost meds, using others' prescriptions).

Entities.Name: Opioid type
Entities.Definition: Mention of a specific opioid name.

Entities.Name: Opioid use underspecified
Entities.Definition: Opioid use described without context to determine legitimacy.

Entities.Name: Other contexts
Entities.Definition: Miscellaneous information relevant to opioid use disorder.
Entities.SampleData: Pt returned after overdose with complicated comorbidities.

Entities.Name: Other drug use
Entities.Definition: Use of non-opioid addictive substances (tobacco, alcohol, cocaine).

Entities.Name: Other drug use negated
Entities.Definition: Patient does not use non-opioid addictive substances.

Entities.Name: Other drug use past
Entities.Definition: Past use of non-opioid addictive substances.

Entities.Name: OUD current
Entities.Definition: Explicit indication of current opioid use disorder.

Entities.Name: OUD negated
Entities.Definition: Statement explicitly indicating absence of opioid use disorder.
Entities.SampleData: [No history of IVDU or opiate pain med use]
Entities.Annotation: [No history of IVDU or opiate pain med use]

Entities.Name: OUD past
Entities.Definition: Indication of a past opioid use disorder.

Entities.Name: OUD psychosocial stressors related
Entities.Definition: Psychosocial or environmental triggers contributing to opioid misuse.

Entities.Name: OUD tx
Entities.Definition: Treatment for opioid use disorder (e.g., methadone, counseling).

Entities.Name: OUD tx negated
Entities.Definition: Patient refused or is not in treatment for OUD.

Entities.Name: Overdose
Entities.Definition: Overdose due to opioids or other drugs.

Entities.Name: Overdose negated
Entities.Definition: Statement indicating no overdose occurred.

Entities.Name: Overdose past
Entities.Definition: History of overdose incidents.

Entities.Name: Overdose uncertain
Entities.Definition: Overdose suspected but not confirmed.
Entities.SampleData: Did not respond to [Narcan in the ED]

Entities.Name: Pain
Entities.Definition: Any mention of physical pain.

Entities.Name: Pain mgmt
Entities.Definition: Statements regarding pain management or opioid prescription use.
Entities.SampleData: [Oxycodone 5 mg Q4H as needed for breakthrough pain]
Entities.Annotation: [Oxycodone 5 mg Q4H as needed for breakthrough pain]

Entities.Name: Patient-level OUD assertion
Entities.Definition: Sentence or summary-level assertion about the presence or absence of OUD.

Entities.Name: Psychiatric
Entities.Definition: Current mental health condition documented in clinical note.

Entities.Name: Psychiatric negated
Entities.Definition: Negation of a mental health condition.

Entities.Name: Psychiatric past
Entities.Definition: History of mental health condition.

Entities.Name: Psychiatric uncertain
Entities.Definition: Mental health condition mentioned with uncertainty.

Entities.Name: Vocational interferences
Entities.Definition: Opioid-related issues affecting employment or education.
Entities.SampleData: [She was a nurse but lost her license secondary to substance abuse]
Entities.Annotation: [lost her license secondary to substance abuse]

Dataset.Name: MIMIC-III Opioid Use Disorder Annotation Corpus
Dataset.Description: Annotated dataset of 3,270 spans across 137 discharge summaries for 100 patients in MIMIC-III with ICD-9 opioid use codes.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Annotations were sentence-based for most classes and phrase-based for opioid type. Dual annotator adjudication was performed for the first 40 patients, and single annotator review for the remaining 60. Each annotation includes class labels and optional attributes (e.g., type, result).
